content: 1 tender by maanel materials yarn craveyarn serenity 420 yards/ 100 grams 100 % baby alpaca 2 skeins or any 4ply yarn with a yardage between 400-420 yards/ 100 grams color misty mountain i used 145 grams needles us 3 /3 25 mm size blocked and pinned 32 cm x 173 cm / 12 5 inches x 68 inches blocked and unpinned 26 cm x 180 cm / 10 inches x 71 inches abbreviations k knit p purl st s stitch es yo yarnover sskp slip two stitches one by one knitwise k1 pass slipped sts over rs / ws right side / wrong side of work copyright 2014 free pattern 2 notes it s easy to customize the size of the scarf add or omit lace pattern repeats each repeat is 5 sts x 12 row the number of sts should be a multiple of 5 + 6 instructions with needles us 3 / 3 25 mm cast on 71 sts border 1 row 1 rs k2 p1 * p1 k3 p1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts p1 k 2 row 2 ws k3 * k1 p3 k1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts k3 repeat these 2 row 4 more times lace section follow written instructions or chart see page 3 row 1 rs k2 p1 * p1 yo sskp yo p1 * repeat * … * to last 3 sts p1 k2 row 2 ws k3 * k1 p3 k1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts k3 row 3 rs k2 p1 * p1 k3 p1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts p1 k 2 row 4 ws k3 * k1 p3 k1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts k3 row 5 rs k2 p1 * p1 k3 p1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts p1 k 2 row 6 ws k3 * k1 p3 k1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts k3 row 7 rs k2 p1 * p1 k3 p1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts p1 k 2 row 8 ws k3 * k1 p3 k1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts k3 row 9 rs k2 p1 * p1 yo sskp yo p1 * repeat * … * to last 3 sts p1 k2 row 10 ws k3 * k1 p3 k1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts k3 row 11 rs k2 p1 * p1 k3 p1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts p1 k 2 row 12 ws k3 * k1 p3 k1 * repeat *… * to last 3 sts k3 copyright 2014 free pattern 3 chart repeat row 1 12 41 times or till desired length work row 1 8 one more time border 2 rs k2 p1 * p1 yo sskp yo p1 * repeat * … * to last 3 sts p1 k2 ws k3 * k1 p3 k1 * repeat *… * to
